sentences.en: ...a young Egyptologist who guided us through tombs and temples with enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: …一位热心地领着我们参观陵墓和寺庙的年轻的埃及学家。

sentences.en: A guide gives a brief talk on the history of the site.
sentences.cn: 导游简要地介绍了那个遗址的历史。

sentences.en: a tour guide
sentences.cn: 导游

sentences.en: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.cn: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.en: Details of how to use the various programs are in the user guide .
sentences.cn: 如何使用各种程序，在用户指南里都有详细的说明。

sentences.en: During the morning your guide will take you around the city.
sentences.cn: 导游上午会带你们游览全城。

sentences.en: Follow our step-by-step guide .
sentences.cn: 跟着我们的分步指南去做。

sentences.en: He should have let his instinct guide him.
sentences.cn: 他本该相信他的直觉。

sentences.en: No self-respecting gourmet would travel in France without the Michelin red guide.
sentences.cn: 任何地道的美食家游览法国时都会带着一本红皮的《米其林指南》。

sentences.en: Pubs are dirty, smelly and unfriendly, according to the Good Pub Guide.
sentences.cn: 据《好酒吧指南》所说，酒吧一般环境肮脏，气味难闻，而且气氛很不友好。

sentences.en: Teenagers need adults to guide them.
sentences.cn: 十几岁的青少年需要大人来引导。

sentences.en: The figures are only a rough guide .
sentences.cn: 这些数据只是一个大致的参考。

sentences.en: The guide book contains a short write-up of each hotel.
sentences.cn: 指南上有对每个饭店的简评。

sentences.en: The guide is being translated into several languages for publication near Christmas.
sentences.cn: 该手册正被译成数种语言，将在临近圣诞节时出版。

sentences.en: The Macmillan Guide had forewarned me of what to expect.
sentences.cn: 《麦克米伦指南》已经事先告诫过我会遇到什么情况。

sentences.en: The new e-books will include a host of Rough Guide titles.
sentences.cn: 新电子书将包括大量的简明指南。

sentences.en: The polls are not a reliable guide of how people will vote.
sentences.cn: 根据这些民意测验来判断人们将如何投票并不可靠。

sentences.en: The Rough Guide to Nepal is a comprehensive guide to the region.
sentences.cn: 《尼泊尔概况》是一本全面介绍该地区的旅游指南。

sentences.en: This is it, folks: the best record guide in the business.
sentences.cn: 就是这个，伙计们，业内最好的唱片指南。

sentences.en: Using the straight edge as a guide, trim the cloth to size.
sentences.cn: 用直尺比照着,将布料裁剪成合适的尺寸.

sentences.en: We had a knowledgeable guide in the person of George Adams.
sentences.cn: 我们有一位见识广博的导游乔治·亚当斯。

sentences.en: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.cn: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

sentences.en: We've arranged a walking tour of the city with your guide.
sentences.cn: 我们已安排大家在导游的带领下步行游览这座城市。

sentences.en: When selecting fresh fish, let your taste buds be your guide.
sentences.cn: 挑选鲜鱼时，要靠味觉才行。

phrases.tran_cn: 略示其意，作为大体上的示意
指南，参考手册；指导手册
导辊，导向辊；校正辊；导滚
尺度索，准绳；导纱钩；导丝钩
导光管；光波导；光导纤维
电视指南（美国知名的电视类刊物）

trans.tran_cn: 指南，导游，准则，指导的事物
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around

trans.tran_cn: 给…当导游，指导，阐明，搀扶…走，带…参观，给…带路，驾驶
trans.tran_en: to take someone to a place
